name: Nucleus UI: Mobile App – UI Component Library
description:
v1.1.5 – Oct 17, 2021

We removed pressed state variant from switch, checkbox, and radio button components.

---

Create mobile app mockups or prototypes in Figma at speed.


Nucleus is a free UI component library that provides you the building blocks you need to design your next mobile app.


✅ More than 300 components (+ variants)

✅ More than 50+ component categories (Buttons, Switches, Text fields, and many more)

✅ 36 screens for examples

✅ Built with style library, constraints, variants, and auto-layout

✅ 4pt grid

✅ Based on iOS Human Interface Guidelines (with some additional Google Material components )

✅ AA – WCAG


Support Nucleus
